body:
Hi,

I want to optimize number and locations of luminaire (4 parameters) in MOGA. Locations can be achieved because there is _ptList in HB_Luminaire Zone component. But how about the number of luminaires? Also, the points of each new added luminaires should be different and should be able to be connected to Octopus' Genome input.

Anybody know how to do this?
topic: How to Optimize Number of Luminaires in MOGA?
